value.title: Enhance Power BI report designs for the user interface
value.excerpt: Designing the user interface (UI) is about how reports are consumed, including the appearance and behavior of them, and it is the final report development stage.

value.title: Integrate content with Power BI client APIs
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Power BI client APIs to develop solutions that respond to subscribable events and interact with Power BI content.

value.title: Enforce data permissions for Power BI embedded analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to enforce data permissions for Power BI embedded analytics.

value.title: Set up permissions to embed Power BI content
value.excerpt: Learn which settings and permissions to use for internal and external users of your app with embedded Power BI content.

value.title: Introduction to Power BI for Tableau users
value.excerpt: This module explores how Microsoft Power BI and Tableau connect to data and help you build visualizations.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Use tools to optimize Power BI performance
value.excerpt: Use tools to develop, manage, and optimize Power BI data model and DAX query performance.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code.
